articles.description: Latest football news, build-up to this week's internationals, and reaction to Spain sacking Women's World Cup-winning coach Jorge Vilda.
articles.title: Football news & reaction to sacking of Spain coach Vilda

articles.description: Follow live text updates and BBC radio commentary from the fourth day of round 13 of the 2023 County Championship.
articles.title: County Championship day four - radio & text

articles.description: Former Spain head coach Jorge Vilda says being sacked weeks after winning the Women's World Cup is "unfair".
articles.title: Sacking is unfair after World Cup win - ex-Spain coach Vilda

articles.description: American student athletes, who previously only received compensation from universities in the form of scholarships, can now earn money for endorsement deals. It is changing campus bank balances and the shape of stateside sport.
articles.title: The million-dollar hustle changing US sport

articles.description: Rory McIlroy has increasing confidence about Europe's Ryder Cup chances and has backed the selection of Swedish rookie Ludvig Aberg.
articles.title: McIlroy likes look of Europe's Ryder Cup team

articles.description: BBC Director of Sport Barbara Slater is to retire after 14 years in the role and 40 years at the BBC
articles.title: BBC Director of Sport Slater announces retirement

articles.description: Watch New Zealand's "monster" sixes as they beat England by six wickets at Trent Bridge to draw the four-match T20 series.
articles.title: Watch NZ's 'monster' batting display to level T20 series

articles.description: Novak Djokovic reaches a record 47th men's Grand Slam semi-final with a straight-set win over Taylor Fritz at the US Open.
articles.title: Djokovic into record 47th Grand Slam semi-final

articles.description: The crash in 2018 outside Leicester City's stadium killed five people, including the club's chairman.
articles.title: Leicester City helicopter crash caused by 'sequence of failures'

articles.description: Yoram Moefana is named at inside centre for hosts France in their opening World Cup match against New Zealand on Friday.
articles.title: Hosts France name Moefana at 12 to face All Blacks
